name: Moonfall (itch) (Relatif)
description:
Gameplay:

You have to select the moon and drag it around with the mouse, use the shadow instead of the moon to take care of the fires and don't stay too long in the same place, if the whole family dies it's Game Over!

Story:

Basically, the world has turned into chaos because the sun and the moon got out of their orbits, you as a god's apprentice have to help the earth before all turns into dust, your mission it's to protect as long as you can a family composed by : Molly (The mother), Billy (The father), and, the best character ever, Timmy (The son), while god takes care of the rest of the world. You have at your disposal a piece of the moon, which you can use to calm the fires, but be careful because if you stay a long time at the same spot you're gonna awake the dead!

Fun facts:

This game is for the Trijam of April 11th, it took me more than 3 hours to complete it, mostly because of polishing (I know it needs more) and having to make all the resources, but i'm happy that i acomplished my goal of finishing a game in less than one day (Also this is my first Gamejam submission and first game using clickteam, hope you like it!)
